messages.subject: Site news / additions / early days of unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: In case it was here that someone asked (several weeks ago) where Roya’s account was of her first days of unschooling…. Found some!!
messages.messageBody:
In case it was here that someone asked (several weeks ago) where Roya’s account was of her first days of unschooling…. Found some!!


https://aboutunschooling.blogspot.com/2018/10/early-days-of-unschooling.html

Early days of unschooling

Three things, all Roya-related:

To the bottom of a 2009 combo interview/chat with Pam-the-mom, I have appended the texts of two posts on a now-gone platform, in which Roya describes the earliest days of her unschooling life. The sections are called "part one of a long and fascinating story" and "part two of journey into the center of the universe."
http://sandradodd.com/chats/pamsorooshian

Expanded the page on Roya:
http://sandradodd.com/roya/

Embedded newer version of sound file, of a 2009 talk Roya gave:
http://sandradodd.com/listen/roya
